When Not to Make a Willful Misconduct Determination
In general, accept service department findings of no misconduct as conclusive unless there is a preponderance of evidence to the contrary.
The principles stated in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 1.C.6.c
regarding circumstances in which line of duty (LOD)Â should
not
routinely be questioned also apply to willful misconduct.
